Row.Text: Jacobin
A Great Person with one charge. Can only be trained in Cities with an Avenue, and the specific Jacobin received is random. Each Jacobin can only be received once. Cost increases per Jacobin trained.
Paul Barras
Activate on the Palace to increase all Support effects from Diplomatic Actions by 10%.
Jacques Nicolas Billaud-Varenne
Activate on the Palace to grant all Land Units +3 Combat Strength in Districts.
+3 Combat Strength from Jacques Nicolas Billaud-Varenne
Jacques Pierre Brissot
Activate on the Palace to grant all Units +2 Combat Strength.
+2 Combat Strength from Jacques Pierre Brissot
Etta Palm D'Aelders
Activate on the Palace or a City Hall to add +10[icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness to the Building.
Georges Danton
Activate on the Palace to immediately trigger a Celebration.
Camille Desmoulins
Activate on any City's District to add +1[icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness on Quarters in that City.
Olympe de Gouges
Activate on the Palace to add +1[icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science on Quarters.
Jean-Paul Marat
Activate on the Palace to add +1[icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture on Quarters.
Maximilien Robespierre
Activate on the Palace to unlock a unique Tradition, Reign of Terror; +3[icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture on Quarters, but -25% Growth Rate in Cities.
Louis Antoine de Saint-Just
Activate on an Army Commander to change its name to “Archangel of the Terror.” Units within this Command Radius gain +4 Combat Strength.
Archangel of the Terror
+4 Combat Strength from Louis Antoine de Saint-Just
Revolucionario

A Great Person with one charge. Can only be trained in Cities with a Zócalo, and the specific Revolucionario received is random. Each Revolucionario can only be received once. Cost increases per Revolucionario trained.
Amelio Robles Ávila
Activate on a Zócalo to grant 2 free Soldaderas with +3 Combat Strength.
+3 Combat Strength from Amelio Robles Ávila
Vicente Guerrero
Activate on the Palace to immediately trigger a Celebration.
Petra Herrera
Activate on an Army Commander. All Soldaderas Units within the Command Radius gain +3 Combat Strength.
+3 Combat Strength from Petra Herrera
Miguel Hidalgo
Activate in a Town's Urban District to summon a free Infantry Unit on every land Urban District in that Town.
Ángela Jiménez
Activate on an Army Commander to grant +10[icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture for every Commander Level it has.
Benito Juárez
Activate on a Zócalo to grant +1 Social Policy slot.
José María Morelos
Activate on an Army Commander to heal all Units in the Command Radius.
Antonio López de Santa Anna
Activate on an Army Commander to grant it enough experience for 5 Commander Levels.
Pancho Villa
Activate on an Army Commander. When a Unit within this Commander’s Command Radius defeats an enemy Unit, gain[icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold equal to 25% of its Combat Strength.
Emiliano Zapata
Activate on a City Center to grant +1[icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture to all Farms in the Settlement.
Uparat

A Great Person with one charge. Can only be trained in Cities when an Indepedent Power has been befriended, and the specific Uparat received is random. Each Uparat can only be received once. Cost increases per Uparat trained.
Chakrabongse
Activate on Palace to immediately receive 100[icon:YIELD_DIPLOMACY] Influence.
Itsarasunthon
Activate on a District to immediately trigger a Celebration.
Phibun
Activate on a District to give the City +4[icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production for every City-State you are Suzerain of.
Pinklao
Activate on a District to give the City +4[icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture for every City-State you are Suzerain of.
Pridi
Activate on a District to give the City +4[icon:YIELD_DIPLOMACY] Influence for every City-State you are Suzerain of.
Dara Rasmi
Activate on an City-State you are Suzerain of to turn it into a Town under your control.
Sakdiphonlasep
Activated on Tropical Terrain to grant 2 Chang Beun with +3 Combat Strength.
+3 Sakdiphonlasep
Senanurak
Activate on a Commander to grant Units in the Command Radius +1 Combat Strength for every City-State you are Suzerain of.
Vajiravudh
Activate on a District to give the City +4[icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science for every City-State you are Suzerain of.
Wichaichan
Activate on an Independent Power. This Independent Power becomes a City-State with you as Suzerain.
Victory
Great Banker
Activate on another leader's capital to establish a world bank office. Costs gold and influence. Cost scales with relationship.
